title: Queue Pop
body: Okay, so I've recently tried playing duo queue with a friend who has a low priority queue ban due to his power outage forcing him out of the game. When we try to queue we wait the five minutes and when the queue finally pops we both accept. But then someone doesn't accept and the queue pops a second time right after the first queue. For some special reason the updated client decides to keep me from seeing the second pop, disabling me from accepting, and then after so many tries of waiting and popping the queue, Leaver Buster tells me I've denied too many queues and gave me a timer as well. Who can tell me this is okay, but more importantly who will tell me this will be fixed ASAP.

replies.body:
Does this happen while you're using the *Legacy Client* as well? Some players have reported this only occurs on the Beta Client. You can access the Legacy Client from login:

https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/article_attachments/215576628/Launch-Legacy-Client.jpg

Let me know if this caused any change.
